query:
-- Create footer menus for the 3 columns
INSERT INTO navigation_menus (name, location, is_active, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES 
  ('footer-learners', 'footer', 1, NOW(), NOW()),
  ('footer-coaches', 'footer', 1, NOW(), NOW()),
  ('footer-company', 'footer', 1, NOW(), NOW());

-- Get the IDs of the newly created menus
SET @learners_id = (SELECT id FROM navigation_menus WHERE name = 'footer-learners' LIMIT 1);
SET @coaches_id = (SELECT id FROM navigation_menus WHERE name = 'footer-coaches' LIMIT 1);
SET @company_id = (SELECT id FROM navigation_menus WHERE name = 'footer-company' LIMIT 1);

-- Seed footer-learners items
INSERT INTO navigation_menu_items (menu_id, label, url, icon, sort_order, is_visible, target, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES
  (@learners_id, 'Find a Coach | Trouver un coach', '/coaches', 'Search', 1, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@learners_id, 'Pricing | Tarification', '/pricing', 'CreditCard', 2, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@learners_id, 'Our Curriculum | Notre Curriculum', '/curriculum', 'BookOpen', 3, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@learners_id, 'FAQ | FAQ', '/faq', 'HelpCircle', 4, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW());

-- Seed footer-coaches items
INSERT INTO navigation_menu_items (menu_id, label, url, icon, sort_order, is_visible, target, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES
  (@coaches_id, 'Become a Coach | Devenir coach', '/become-a-coach', 'UserPlus', 1, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@coaches_id, 'For Departments | Pour les ministères', '/for-departments', 'Building2', 2, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@coaches_id, 'For Business | Pour les entreprises', '/rusingacademy/for-business', 'Briefcase', 3, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@coaches_id, 'For Government | Pour le gouvernement', '/rusingacademy/for-government', 'Landmark', 4, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@coaches_id, 'Blog | Blog', '/blog', 'FileText', 5, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW());

-- Seed footer-company items
INSERT INTO navigation_menu_items (menu_id, label, url, icon, sort_order, is_visible, target, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES
  (@company_id, 'About | À propos', '/about', 'Info', 1, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@company_id, 'Contact | Contact', '/contact', 'Mail', 2, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@company_id, 'Privacy | Confidentialité', '/privacy', 'Shield', 3, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@company_id, 'Terms | Conditions', '/terms', 'FileText', 4, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@company_id, 'Cookies | Cookies', '/cookies', 'Cookie', 5, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW()),
  (@company_id, 'Accessibility | Accessibilité', '/accessibility', 'Eye', 6, 1, '_self', NOW(), NOW());
